meanings.definition: An inflammation of the conjunctiva, typically causing redness and discharge.
meanings.sent1: My sister missed school because she had pinkeye and her eye was all red.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed eye drops to treat the pinkeye infection.
meanings.sent3: The pinkeye made Tim's eye look like a stop sign!
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like pinkeye, spreading quickly and causing discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The pinkeye in his eye was as bright as a cherry tomato.

meanings.definition: A contagious infection of the eye caused by bacteria or viruses.
meanings.sent1: The children had to stay home from school to avoid spreading pinkeye to others.
meanings.sent2: Proper hygiene can help prevent the spread of pinkeye among family members.
meanings.sent3: The pinkeye outbreak at the daycare was a real eye-opener!
meanings.sent4: The pinkeye virus spread through the office like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The doctor warned about the dangers of rubbing your eyes and getting pinkeye.

meanings.definition: A common eye condition that is easily spread through contact.
meanings.sent1: Washing hands regularly can help prevent the spread of pinkeye.
meanings.sent2: Avoiding touching your eyes can reduce the risk of getting pinkeye.
meanings.sent3: The pinkeye at the sleepover turned it into a blink-and-you'll-miss-it event!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was contagious, like pinkeye in a classroom.
meanings.sent5: The pinkeye outbreak in the community spread faster than gossip.
